item.title: episode 10: low budget animation
item.description: I honestly thought this was a brony song until tonight when I altavista’d it and discovered it was actually the ending of some movie where it rains burgers credits to @LunarFroxy, @Tridashie and @roundtripguy on Twitter for starting a meme

item.title: episode 9: 1998

item.description: 2020 is not a real year they say

item.title: episode 4: giggles
item.description: I have no idea who this Giggles guy is but he looks nice co-written by the GPT-2 AI living at talktotransformer.com

item.title: episode 3: illegal
